extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database manager for stored font features.

      • saveItem

        public void saveItem(java.lang.String name)
        Saves feature values from the FeatureController in the database with the given name and current datetime.
        Parameters:
        name - a font name

      • loadItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<FontItem> loadItems()
        Returns the list of stored fonts from the database.

        Returned list is sorted by created datetime in decreasing order.

        Returns:
        the list of stored fonts

      • deleteItem

        public void deleteItem(int id)
        Delete the font data corresponding to the given id from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the font data
